pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Set of RStudio Addins // A set of RStudio addins that are designed to be used in combination with user-defined RStudio keyboard shortcuts. These addins either insert text at a cursor position (e.g. insert operators %%, -, %$%, etc.) or replace symbols in selected pieces of text (e.g., convert backslashes to forwardslashes which results in stings like "c:\data\" converted into "c:/data/").
